definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: As of Tuesday, the volcano in Iceland was still erupting, though the cloud was lower.
sentences.chinese: 截至周二，冰岛火山仍在喷发，但火山灰云有所降低。

sentences.english: This is Iceland, a land of fire and ice.
sentences.chinese: 这就是冰岛，一个冰火交织的极致王国。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from volcanic ash April 17, 2010 near Eyjafjallajokull, Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛艾雅法拉火山附近马群逃离火山灰。

sentences.english: There was a US base here until just two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 直到两年前，冰岛还有一个美军基地驻守。

sentences.english: Iceland was able to secure an emergency loan from Russia.
sentences.chinese: 最后赖于俄国的紧急贷款，冰岛免于罹难。

sentences.english: Iceland has already begun constructing a hydrogen grid using plentiful geothermal energy.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛已经着手建设一座利用丰富地热能源的氢气站。

sentences.english: More than 7% of the 10-year-old boys in Iceland take the drug.
sentences.chinese: 在冰岛的10岁孩子中，服用这种药物的人超过7%。

sentences.english: And in the 9th century Old Norse was carried far westward to Iceland.
sentences.chinese: 在9世纪，古斯堪的纳维亚语往西发展至冰岛。

sentences.english: In Iceland, many of the buildings and even swimming pools are heated with geothermal hot water.
sentences.chinese: 在冰岛，许多大楼甚至游泳池都是由地热水供热。

sentences.english: They all sat in front of the telly and watched the Icelandic volcano erupting.
sentences.chinese: 他们全都坐在电视机前，看冰岛火山爆发。

sentences.english: The Icelander's small homes were made of earth and leaves.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛人住的小房子是用泥土和树叶盖起来的。

sentences.english: The government didn't have enough foreign currency to bail out the banks.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛政府也没有足够的外汇储备可以用来救助银行。

sentences.english: The icelander burned our cash, and blew the ash to us.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛人烧了偶们的钱，又把灰给吹了回来。

sentences.english: There is every risk that Iceland may follow suit.
sentences.chinese: 而冰岛政府极有危险陷入诉讼。

sentences.english: And Glitnir, Iceland’s third-largest bank, was nationalised.
sentences.chinese: 冰岛第三大银行Glitnir被国有化。

definition: abbr. for 波斯尼亞和黑塞哥維那|波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那[Bo1 si1 ni2 ya4 he2 Hei1 sai4 ge1 wei2 na4] Bosnia and Herzegovina
